title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST/CLI API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. on macOS/Linux/Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, retrieval.

title: llama-index-integrations/llms/ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embeddings connectors for local Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat, models, settings) for Ollama; drop-in replacement for ChatGPT-UI.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and conversation management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) for Ollama with docker-compose examples.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Spring Boot starter available.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chatting and generating with Ollama models.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot template that streams responses from a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming support.

title: ollama-copilot-vim
summary: Vim/Neovim plugin for AI code completion powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on Linux/macOS.

title: ollama-distroless
summary: Distroless + scratch container images for Ollama hardened for production use.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI commands (summarize, rewrite, translate) via Ollama.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin to run local LLM prompts on blocks using Ollama.
